name: Weapon
description:
Weapons are entities with firing, reloading and aiming functionalities.

They are fully customizable, all pieces of the weapon can be changed with immense possibility of creation.

functions.name: Reload
functions.description: Forces this Weapon to reload
functions.description_long: Forces this Weapon to reload (only if being handled by a Character)

functions.name: SetAmmoBag
functions.description: Sets this Weapon's Ammo in the Bag

functions.name: SetAmmoClip
functions.description: Sets this Weapon's Ammo in the Clip

functions.name: SetAmmoSettings
functions.description: Aux for setting and configuring ammo

functions.name: SetAnimationFire
functions.description: Animation played by the Weapon when Firing

functions.name: SetAnimationCharacterFire
functions.description: Animation played by the Character when Firing

functions.name: SetAnimationReload
functions.description: Animation played by the Character when Reloading

functions.name: GetAnimationReload
functions.description: Gets the reload animation

functions.name: SetAutoReload
functions.description: If the Character will reload automatically when ammo empties
functions.description_long: If the Character will reload automatically when ammo empties. Default is true

functions.name: SetBulletColor
functions.description: Set the Bullet Color
functions.description_long:
Set the Bullet Color

Only has effect if using Bullet Trail particle P_Bullet_Trail or if you particle has the Color parameter

functions.name: SetAutoReload
functions.description: Sets if the Weapon auto reloads when ammo empties

functions.name: SetBulletSettings
functions.description: Aux for setting and configuring the Bullet

functions.name: SetCadence
functions.description: Speed of shots

functions.name: SetClipCapacity
functions.description: Capacity of the Weapon's clip

functions.name: SetDamage
functions.description: Set the Base Weapon's Damage
functions.description_long:
Base Weapon's Damage

This will be multiplied by multiplier factors when hitting specific bones

functions.name: SetHandlingMode
functions.description: Sets how the Character grabs this Weapon

functions.name: SetLeftHandTransform
functions.description: Left Hand Offset

functions.name: SetMagazineMesh
functions.description: Set the mesh used when the Character reloads the weapon
functions.description_long:
Set the mesh used when the Character reloads the weapon.

Will drop this Mesh as an animation effect.

parameters.name: magazine_mesh_hide_bone
parameters.description: Weapon bone to hide when reloading it

functions.name: PlayAnimation
functions.description: Plays an Animation on this Weapon

parameters.name: loop_indefinitely
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Weapon has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: blend_in_time
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Weapon has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: blend_out_time
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Weapon has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: play_rate
parameters.description: This parameter is only used if the Weapon has an Animation Blueprint

parameters.name: stop_all_montages
parameters.description: Stops all running Montages from the same Group. This parameter is only used if the Weapon has an Animation Blueprint

functions.name: SetParticlesBulletTrail
functions.description: Particle of the Bullet flying

functions.name: SetParticlesBarrel
functions.description: Particle of the Fire Blast in the muzzle

functions.name: SetParticlesShells
functions.description: Particle of the empty bullet flying from the weapon when shooting

functions.name: SetRightHandOffset
functions.description: Set the offset of Right Hand
functions.description_long: Set the Offset of Right Hand. To position relative to the camera.

functions.name: SetSightFOVMultiplier
functions.description: The FOV multiplier when ADS

functions.name: SetSightTransform
functions.description: Offset applied to align player's head to weapon's sight and rotation applied on the weapon when ADS

functions.name: SetSoundDry
functions.description: Sound when weapon has not bullet and try to shoot

functions.name: SetSoundLoad
functions.description: Sound when Loading a magazine

functions.name: SetSoundUnload
functions.description: Sound when Unloading a magazine

functions.name: SetSoundZooming
functions.description: Sound when Zooming

functions.name: SetSoundFire
functions.description: Sound when Shooting

functions.name: SetSoundAim
functions.description: Sound when Aiming

functions.name: SetSoundFireLastBullets
functions.description: Sound when firing with only having X remaining bullets in the magazine
functions.description_long: Sound when firing with only having X remaining bullets in the magazine, useful for last shot 'ping' or sound when low on bullets

parameters.name: remaining_bullets_count
parameters.description: The amount of remaining bullet to start playing this sound

functions.name: SetSpread
functions.description: Base Weapon's Spread

parameters.name: spread
parameters.description: the higher the less precision - recommended value: 20

functions.name: SetRecoil
functions.description: Base Weapon's Recoil

functions.name: SetUsageSettings
functions.description: Sets if the Weapon can hold to keep firing and if it needs to release to fire

functions.name: SetWallbangSettings
functions.description: Sets how the bullet will pass through walls

parameters.name: max_distance
parameters.description: Max distance to pass through another wall

functions.name: GetAmmoBag
functions.description: Gets this Weapon's Ammo Bag

functions.name: GetAmmoClip
functions.description: Gets this Weapon's Ammo Clip

functions.name: GetBoneTransform
functions.description: Gets a Bone Transform in world space given a bone name

events.name: Fire
events.description: Triggered when Weapon fires (this will be triggered for each shot)

events.name: Reload
events.description: When a Weapon is reloaded, optionally by a Character

events.name: AmmoClipChange
events.description: When the Ammo Clip is changed, by reloading or manually setting through scripting

events.name: AmmoBagChange
events.description: When the Ammo Bag is changed, by reloading or manually setting through scripting
